name: Fat Owl! Lite
description:
Fat Owl! Lite is the free version of Fat Owl!.

Meet Fat Owl!...

She is very, very clumsy!

You need to help her find the nest for her baby chicks by progressing through the many exciting levels and worlds. In each level, set up the given items, bounce bricks, magnets and blocks in order for Fat Owl's egg to reach the nest. Once you figure how to get the egg to the nest, try to also get the three stars in each level as well. If you manage to get all three stars too, She will be a very happy owl!


FEATURES:
------------------
Get exciting items such as sticks and floating bubbles!

Three full worlds with constant, regular updated worlds!

Use the level's bounce bricks, blocks and magnets to help you on your way!


Privacy Policy: http://www.rocketsplashgames.com/apps/privacy-policy.html
